psychographic_lifestyles.name: Health-Conscious Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Prioritizing health through diet, exercise, and wellness practices.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Eco-Friendly/Sustainable Living
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Lifestyle focused on reducing environmental impact and promoting sustainability.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Tech-Savvy Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Embracing technology in daily life and staying updated with tech trends.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Luxury or Affluent Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Living with high-end products, services, and exclusive experiences.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Minimalist Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Simplifying life by reducing possessions and focusing on essentials.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Adventurous/Travel-Focused Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Regularly seeking new experiences and exploring different places.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Family-Oriented Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Prioritizing family time and activities centered around loved ones.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Career-Focused Professional
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Dedication to professional growth and career advancement.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Fitness Enthusiast
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Integrating physical activity and fitness into daily routines.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Social Butterfly/Extroverted Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Enjoying social events, networking, and spending time with others.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Homebody Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Preferring the comfort of home over social outings.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Artistic or Creative Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Engaging in creative pursuits like art, music, or writing.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Spiritual or Mindful Living
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Focusing on inner peace, meditation, and spiritual growth.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Fashion-Forward Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Keeping up with the latest fashion trends and styles.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: DIY or Maker Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Creating and building projects independently.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Foodie Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Exploring different cuisines and dining experiences.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Digital Nomad/Freelancer Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Working remotely while traveling or living in various locations.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Frugal or Budget-Conscious Living
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Prioritizing saving money and spending wisely.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Single and Independent Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Emphasizing personal freedom and individual pursuits.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Retiree Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Enjoying leisure time and activities post-retirement.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Pet-Lover Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Integrating pets into daily life and activities.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Student or Academic Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Focusing on education and academic pursuits.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Entrepreneurial Lifestyle
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Building businesses and pursuing entrepreneurial ventures.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Urban City Living
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Embracing the fast-paced lifestyle of urban environments.

psychographic_lifestyles.name: Rural or Country Living
psychographic_lifestyles.description: Enjoying a slower pace of life in rural settings.
